subject: Availability Simsonn SQ Pro Racing Simulator Sequential Shifter
description_text:
Dear customer support,
Is there any information when the
Simsonn SQ Pro Racing Simulator Sequential Shifter will be available again?
Best regards
Philipp Udras

conversations.body_text: Hi Philipp Udras,  It will be available for sale soon and is currently in the testing phase.Â
